require 'oci8' require 'csv' require 'bigdecimal'
OCI8.properties[:tcp_connect_timeout] = 2 #10 OCI8.properties[:connect_timeout] = 3 #15 OCI8.properties[:send_timeout] = 60 OCI8.properties[:recv_timeout] = 60
class BigDecimal def to_str; self.to_i.to_s end def to_s; self.to_str end def inspect; self.to_str end end
def getdb url, sql, out=\$stdout begin
conn = OCI8.new url res = conn.exec sql
while x = res.fetch \$stderr.puts x.to_csv end rescue ArgumentError => e \$stderr.puts "#{url} \t#{e.message}" rescue OCIError => e \$stderr.puts "#{url} \t#{e.message}" ensure res.close if res rescue nil conn.logoff if conn rescue nil end end
DATA.each_line do |line| line.strip! next if line.empty?
getdb line, 'select name,open_mode from gv\$database'
end
__END__ sys/sys@192.168.0.100/mydb as sysdba
